statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ -10 \\ -16 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ -8 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -6 \\ -11 \\ -2 \\ -13 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
